name: SKCloudServiceCapability
desc: Constants that specify the current capabilities of the user’s music library on the device.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Initializes a cloud service capability with the provided raw value.

items.name: static var musicCatalogPlayback: SKCloudServiceCapability
items.desc: The device allows playback of Apple Music catalog tracks.

items.name: static var musicCatalogSubscriptionEligible: SKCloudServiceCapability
items.desc: The device allows subscription to the Apple Music catalog.

items.name: static var addToCloudMusicLibrary: SKCloudServiceCapability
items.desc: The device allows tracks to be added to the user’s music library.
